subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{zh-forms|s=谁}}
From {{m|und|*du}} + {{m|und|*-i||suffix in independent pronouns}}; cognate with {{och-l|疇|who}}, {{och-l|孰|which one; who}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}). In other {{cog|sit}} languages, compare {{cog|lus|tû||who; which}}, {{cog|cdm|दोह्‌||what}}, {{cog|tbq-kuk-pro|*tuu||who; which (relativizer)}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}; STEDT).

subSections.title: Definitions
Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|兀誰|捨我其誰|誰承望|誰家|誰人|誰知|誰誰|誰何|誰行|舍我其誰|舍我復誰|鹿死誰手|阿誰|莫敢誰何|乜誰|誰們}}

subSections.title: Etymology 5
subSections.text:
{{zh-forms|s=谁|alt=孰:chiâ,咜:chôa}}
From shortening of {{zh-l|是誰|tr=chī-choa̍h}}, from {{zh-l|是誰仔|tr=chī-chūi-á}}.

Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|たれ}}

From {{inh|ja|ojp|sort=たれ|-}}, first attested in the ''{{w|Kojiki}}'' (712 {{CE}}) alongside its older form ''ta'' (see below).

Derived from older {{m|ja||誰|tr=ta|[[who]]}} + {{m|ja|れ|tr=re||[[thing]]|pos=demonstrative nominalizer ending}}. Compare the formation of {{ja-r|これ|gloss=[[this]]}} from {{m|ja|此|tr=ko||this}} + {{ja-l||れ|tr=re}}, {{m|ja|彼|tr=kare||[[that]] [[one]], that [[person]]}} from {{m|ja|彼|tr=ka||that}} + {{ja-l||れ|re}}, etc.

[[supersede|Superseded]] by ''dare'' above starting from around the {{w|Edo period}}.<ref name="DJS"/><ref name="DJR"/> The ''tare'' form does not appear to be used anymore outside of poetry or intentionally archaic text.
